caption: First time here with my girlfriend and I just want to say that the ambiance and decor was fabulous. The food and drinks were good. What made this game place stand out was our amazing server, Luis. Ask for the god sent man when you get here and he'll make your dining experience even better!

This was the best breakfast buffet that I have ever encountered period. The quality was of the highest caliber. Every item was perfect. The omelette bar was beyond belief. The waitstaff and cashier so freaking friendly it was uncanny. The $26 price was worth every penny! Great interior design, loved the food, professional servers. Sometimes hotel restaurants are to be avoided but this is certainly not one such establishment.
The staff was helpful and kind.  Recommended.
American food... yummy. I love this place so much. I will be bringing friends next time. The bill was appropriate. Kinda of like a cafe in Phoenix that I enjoyed.
Good spot for delicious american food. The staff was helpful and kind. The bill was fair. Feels like a place in Charlotte that I enjoyed visiting.

Had dinner night - what an amazing experience. Went with the Tasting Menu - a couple of the dishes had to be altered to accommodate Gluten Free, the Bread (3 types) was Incredible! I want the receipe! Unforgettable Meal

Food was really delicious. Nice ambiance.  Will definitely be back. I wish there was more of a meat selection with the main entree like seared tuna, pork belly, or duck breast. I can only imagine because the steaks were perfection. Thank you for an amazing experience.
Went on lunch. Business lunch. Overall good food and staff.
Nice hideout.

I celebrated my nomination yesterday in this great place. I am glad to say that we enjoyed a wonderful evening and the venue was absolutely the reason for that successful event. The stuff  participated in a sweet manner, the food was yummy and my guests were very  joyful. We shall absolutely come back again for more joyful events. Thank you very much.

They were super courteous and kind even though we were pretty late waiting for our large party to arrive but I ordered the burger and it was lacking a bit in flavor. The chocolate dessert could do well with much less sweetness.
Lovely setting, great staff, good food.
Awesome food, you should definitely get all the cheese and charcuterie they offer. Food was on point, and their Old Fashion was delicious.
Food and Service were wonderful!
Delicious fries
Great service. Amazing food!. Pricy but worth it!!
The food and service was outstanding. I was able to be seated right away. I will return, my hanger steak was like butter :)
One of my favorites!
No complaints here and excellent service
Fantastic service, good beer selection, interesting charcuterie.
Hate is very strong I don't remember being here sorry
The menu and service were ahead of our expectations. We absolutely liked the vibes of this place. Great place to take my family out for lunch.
Definitely eating here again!!
This place is worth giving a shot. They serve big portions for reasonable prices. Regularly clean and with good character. Will come back again.
Lovely oasis above bustling Michigan Ave for lunch. Wonderful food and impeccable service
Amazing place.

I was staying at The Omni and rather than going out decided to try 676 Restaurant on the 4th floor. What a great afternoon discovery it was! Everything was amazing, from the view onto the Magnificent Mile to the incredible wine and you must try the Duck Prosciutto! Amazing service to top it off! Food excellently presented, prepared; food tasted very, very good. Seating very personal, comfortable, initmate.
Great food, ambience and service. 5 stars!

Located on the 4th floor of the Omni Hotel building just off the elevator. Very nice decor open and spacious. Hostess and staff very nice and service oriented. Met a friend for lunch and was seated by the large windows overlooking Michigan Ave which was nice. We started with deviled eggs which were a notch up with salmon on the tops. Creamy fresh and good flavor. You don’t see these on menus these days do it was a nice surprise. Another neat invention was the salmon BLT sandwich. I had the salmon topped garden salad which didn’t disappoint. Portion of salmon was very generous and cooked perfectly! Only thing I would say is it needed a little more dressing combined in the greens along with better portion of goat cheese. All in all it’s a very nice and surprising change up from the typical regular lunch selections and easily accessible downtown. Great for special occasions, groups or even a quick premium lunch.
Great food.

(Translated by Google) Great view, the food is delicious, while the only time in six years, when we have not forgotten to celebrate the wedding anniversary, you can just make some photos in the toilet)  (Original) Супер вид, еда вкусная, пока единственный раз за шесть лет, когда мы не забыли отметить годовщину свадьбы, можно просто в туалете пофоткаться)

(Translated by Google) Bar with beautiful views of the city. Large selection of wines but also interesting cocktail mixes. A little too boring for my taste. You should absolutely try the Negroni with cinnamon.  (Original) Bar mit schöner Aussicht auf die Stadt. Große Auswahl an Weinen aber auch an interessanten Cocktailmischungen. Für meinen Geschmack etwas zu langweilig. Den Negroni mit Zimt sollte man unbedingt probieren.
Excellent food and views!!! If ur a foodie you will love it here.

Visited the bar at the Omni for cocktails before dinner. Get the table in the corner for best views of Michigan Avenue. The waitress was knowledgeable about every kind of cocktail and the truffle Parmesan and chive popcorn is a must! The tart cherry infused bourbon was delicious! Definitely worth the trip if you’re visiting Chicago.

We had dinner here the first night and breakfast both mornings. It is a nice place. I know they have a buffet at breakfast but we went a la carte. The dinner was nice as my friend  had scallops that were large and tasty. They came with a small pool of potatoes so I shared the fries that had come with my veggie burger, which was house made and very nice. The English muffin my friend had was wonderful and my oatmeal was to die for with brown sugar and soy milk that had been heated. It is nice that it is here.

The food and wait staff are exceptional. My son absolutely loves the charcuterie. I had the September Chicken sandwich. Possibly the best chicken sandwich I have had- buttermilk fried with giardiniera, pimentos cheese and pickles. Will definitely come back again.

Waiter prob best I have ever seen. Top notch, very surprised. Ordered the hanger steak never had it before, OMG i dont know if it was how they cooked it or i am just not familiar with this perfect cut of meat.. anyways cooked perfect, steak sauce asked and given a homemade one .... this is better then A1!! My friend had POTATO gnocchis. Excellent extremely fresh this is very hard to impress me with any pasta but this was insane. INSANE best ever!!! 3 complaints chairs are weird dont sit right, to hot in restaurant ( maybe just a hot day in Chicago!), and no veg or salad with my meal, i bought a 36$ dinner. Little bit weird but whatever, def think should accompany it..if i stayed another day in chicago, I would def go here again in a heartbeat, top notch place
Great food and great space

We did not get a main course but had 3 different appetizers, three different cocktails and a flight of 3 beers.  The taste and presentation of the drinks and food were amazing!! (Normally I find when presentations is great i have a little let down with the taste, but not here!)  The bartender also made the night great!! This trip to chicago was for my first wedding anniversary and this place helped make it great!!
Delicious food!
Nice enough location right off Michigan Ave for some decent bar food and imaginative drinks.
Nice, quiet nested away restaurant on the magnificent mile
Braised beef was very well executed.
Very bad for dinner, food was cold and did not taste good

(Translated by Google) Mtp how expensive this place is, I can only give two. Nothing against the staff, brilliant service. But, placing a vine grilled potato heap on the fried potato, and thus risking that the sabot throughout the breakfast is pretty stupid. Then offering cloth napkins that lint off lots of white lint was not something you could expect. There are a lot of places in Chi-town that are better than this.  (Original) Mtp hur kostsamt detta ställe är, kan jag inte annat än ge två. Inget mot personalen, strålande service. Men, att placera en vinegrettindrönkt salladshög på den stekta potatisen, och därmed riskera att sabba hela frukosten är rätt dumt. Att sedan erbjuda tygservetter som luddar av sig massor av vitt ludd va inte heller något man kunde förvänta sig. Det finns oerhört många ställen i Chi-town som är bättre än detta.
I was there for lunch and was impressed with the food and service.
What an amazing total dining experience from start to finish!! I can't express how much fun we had dining here and the food!!! Just amazing.
Service and food is top notch. You may want to ask about coffe drinks, we did not see it on many but asked and revived and both mocha and latte were Excellent!
Great food, nice atmosphere business casual dress. Great selection.
Went for the breakfast buffet... Very good food.  Excellent service.

Had the pleasure of meeting someone here for lunch yesterday and it was wonderful. We both had the tomato bisque with grilled cheese. It was amazing!  The bread was perfectly toasted. My colleague had the grilled salmon salad as well and liked that too. I’d stop here again.
Great place to go,  awesome service and great food.
We love this place! Food and service are always amazing! The atmosphere is chick and elegant!

Came here for breakfast on our last day as guests of the hotel. DELICIOUS food, really great service. Be prepared to spend quite a bit of money compared to some other breakfast options in the area, but really worth it. Had the avocado toast- it was amazing. Must try.

Great service, the staff members were all very nice. The food was good - we went to the buffet which had lots of fruit, fresh bread, honey, house-whipped cream cheese, omelet making station (the fact that they had egg whites made me super happy!), French toast, bacon, specialty sausage, and several other options. $28/person for the buffet. Yummy!
676 Restaurant is a hidden gem!
No one greeted us when we came for lunch. But once we walked in and found someone, we were well taken care of. Cool view, great iced tea, food was pretty good.

Great food. Definitely try the bacon wrapped dates. I'm not usually much on bacon wrapped anything, but the bacon was done and together with the dates and sauce they were excellent! The view wasn't exactly great but the atmosphere was nice.
Nice space, so-so food, good service.
Great food and mood. Excellent service
Order the creme Brûlée AND the s’mores. You won’t regret it!

Was visiting from out of state. This place is kind of classy when it comes to the menu but they do have a stripped down one with burgers. Staff was super knowledgeable when it came to Celiac Disease. Even brought me my own gluten free toast when they brought everyone else their normal bread. They do not have a dedicated gf fryer, but they do have a dedicated gf toaster! The food was decent but the service was great!

Everything we ate was fabulous! Our entrees ran $30 each but were very much worth every penny! Our service was on point and everyone was so nice! I'm honestly baffled as to why it wasn't packed when we were there (around 5pm on a Saturday)!

Breakfast here was delightful.  Buffet was extremely nice with all the usual fare with extra special touches. Custom omelets, pancakes, waffles and French toast.  Muffins and pastries with various types of butters and salsas. Bagels, French bread, jellies and jams, coffee and juice all included.
Best steak ever. Friendly staff. Good location.
Love their food, service is great! Food and service are excellent. Very good prices. The Chile Verdi and Chimichangas are my favorites. Try the Chili Verde! Amazing!
Food is great, especially the cheese.
We ended up here on a Saturday afternoon We had bar meatballs, sausage flatbread & a 676 burger! It was to die for!  Honestly really good food & the service by Adrian was excellent!
Very high class restaurant with amazing service and food.  All food is sourced locally too. Be prepared for a large bill however.
I had amazing experience at this restaurant, place was cozy, beautifully designed, has bar, nice view through the big windows. Delicious food and drinks, great customer service.

Upon arrival at the Omni Hotel, my wife and I were looking for a bite to eat, but it was already 10:30pm and our options were slim.  Luckily, 676 was still open and the World Series was on TV for us to watch.  We both ordered drinks and then decided to share the short rib sandwich with fries.  This meat dish was heavenly, and I almost (almost) regret sharing it, because it was so tasty and flavorful.  The fries were pretty decent too, but nothing can take away from the taste of this short rib sandwich.  Seating around the bar was plentiful and there were TV's everywhere so that anyone who was in the bar could see the game on TV without straining too much.
Pricy, but not outrageous. Great food, very nice breakfast selection and buffet,  great service, nice views
Lousy service. Waited 25 minutes for service. Sat at a weird table in the corner. Room was very cold. Wouldn't recommend for the price.
Delicious cheeses and charcuterie. Seasonally rotating menu that is always great. Gorgeous views of Michigan Ave.

I thought the food was really good. Truly a fine dining experience. The rating suggests median price, that is misleading. It's not super expensive but I feel is definitely on the premium side, though it was worth it. The hostess was very welcoming and very cute. Atmosphere was cosy, romantic and relaxing. Dessert was fantastic, just as impressive as the main course. Dinner for 2, around $100 before tip.
Great art gallery have fabulous art, pottery, jewelry, photography and fused glass all at reasonable prices.
I visited around  March and the food was great. The service was top notch. Mr. Parkinson made sure everything was perfect. Would highly recommend dining here.
Excellent service and food! Had the buffet which was a gift from our daughter and son-in-law. The custom made breakfast bowl was scrumptious!
Great atmosphere and delisious lunch. Kids friendly and nice view on Michigan avenue.
Great place for cocktails and hors d'ouvres.
The charcuterie and cheese pairings were ready delicious and I enjoyed my margarita sweetened with just honey. We sat by the windows in the bar and liked out over Magnificent Mile.
Great job thank you

A welcoming open setting of the bar and restaurant looking out over Michigan Avenue.  There is an nice section with comfortable seats in one section of the bar kind of closed off making it more of a lounge.  The area sourced food is a hallmark of 676 and much appreciated.   Was surprised to find such well prepared salmon.  Cheese selections are excellent.  The flatbreads are well sized and tasty.  Enjoyed the simply made housemade Italian sausage flatbread a great deal.  The Charcuterie was excellent for small bites. Well worth the visit.
Great views and good drinks!
The food was awesome and plentiful. I got a salad and it was very tasty. More of my lunch companions ordered tacos and really liked them. For a quick, no nonsense meal, it was great.
Went here on restaurant week. A bit expensive, but quite tasty.
Good
Great food and great service.

Very nice place, and drinks were not as expensive as one would think. Our waitress was very nice, but we were surprised when we asked for some nuts to have along with the drinks and she replied they charged for any type of apettizers... we had been to Boston Omni's bar a few days earlier and it was different.
Fresh local food. Amazing spread at the breakfast buffet. Their ice tea is spectacular and presented in a cool fashion.
Good atmosphere, reasonable prices got this hotel lounge. Views of the magnificent mile are great.
Sat for 15 min waiting someone to take my order; walked out.

The best veggie burger!  Made with peanuts and lentils.  My brother had the cheeseburger and said it was equally as good.  The presentation was fabulous.  Both burgers were loaded and prepared how a burger should be prepared.  Omni hotels always have great food.
Awesome Sunday buffet!
Went for brunch today and had a lovely time. The buffet was amazing and They had a great spread of fruit. Also they have good prices and it was only $22 per person.

Large reasonably priced breakfast buffet.  Focused on locally-sourced ingredients.  Excellent flavors and a nice atmosphere with a good view of the Magnificent Mile.  Will definitely go back.  I do have one minor complaint: why was there only a choice of Stonyfield Farms pre-packaged yogurt?  I expected a nice unsweetened local blend served from a chilled bowl like you find in Europe.

Greatest breakfast I have ever had!!  I am not a buffet lover, but the breakfast buffet was amazing.  The coffee was delicious, every ingredient so fresh, and the service was spectacular.  Nothing was spared to please us. Kudos!
